EMAIL_FORMAT_HELP: Ensure email has valid format, example: example@domain.com
URL_FORMAT_HELP: URL must start with http:// or https:// and have valid format
UUID_FORMAT_HELP: UUID must have standard format, example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must have at least 8 characters
PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY: Should combine uppercase, lowercase, numbers and special characters
USERNAME_MIN_LENGTH: Username must have at least 3 characters
WEBSITE_MAX_LENGTH: Website URL must not exceed 200 characters
PHONE_FORMAT_HELP: Phone number must be in valid format, example: +1234567890 or 123-456-7890
DATE_FORMAT_HELP: Date must be in valid format, example: YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY
DATE_OF_BIRTH_HELP: Date of birth must be a valid date and you must be at least 13 years old
STRING_REQUIRED: This field is required and cannot be empty
STRING_MIN_LENGTH: Must be at least {{min}} characters long
ARRAY_MAX_ITEMS: Must not contain more than {{max}} items
CUSTOM_VALIDATION_FAILED: Input does not meet the required criteria
